using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.Collections.ObjectModel;

namespace MobileDetect.MatchingRules
{
    public partial class DefaultRules
    {

        //The version of Mobile_Detect rules used
        //https://github.com/serbanghita/Mobile-Detect
        public const string Version = "$template_version";

        public static readonly ReadOnlyDictionary<string, string> BrowserRegexStrings = new ReadOnlyDictionary<string, string>(new Dictionary<string, string> {
            $template_browsers
        });

        public static ReadOnlyDictionary<string, string[]> MobileHeaders = new ReadOnlyDictionary<string, string[]>(new Dictionary<string, string[]> {
            $template_mobileHeaders
        });

        public static readonly ReadOnlyDictionary<string, string> PhonesRegexStrings = new ReadOnlyDictionary<string, string>(new Dictionary<string, string> {
            $template_phones
        });

        public static readonly ReadOnlyDictionary<string, string> TabletRegexStrings = new ReadOnlyDictionary<string, string>(new Dictionary<string, string> {
            $template_tablets
        });

        public static readonly ReadOnlyDictionary<string, string> OsRegexStrings = new ReadOnlyDictionary<string, string>(new Dictionary<string, string> {
            $template_os
        });

        public static readonly string[] UserAgentHeaders = new[] {
            $template_userAgentHeaders
        };

        public static readonly ReadOnlyDictionary<string, string> UtilitiesRegexStrings = new ReadOnlyDictionary<string, string>(new Dictionary<string, string> {
            $template_utilities
        });
    }
}
